formcaption.a2: This rule is related to form

a22.l: select to_char(caption||'-('||ntransid||')') fcaption,ntransid from axpdef_tstruct where ntransid!='axrlr' and runtimemod='T' order by 1

uroles.a2: Apply this rule only for the roles selected here

a22.l: select to_char(groupname)mslist,'Userroles' groupby,1 grouporder, 'F' selected from axusergroups a order by 1

select opr from (select 'Equal to' opr FROM dual union all select 'Not equal to' FROM dual union all select 'Greater than' FROM dual union all select 'Lesser than' FROM dual union all select 'In' FROM dual union all select 'Not in' FROM dual)a

select * from (select 'And' cnd FROM dual union all select 'Or' FROM dual union all select 'And(' FROM dual union all select 'Or(' FROM dual union all select '(' FROM dual union all select ')' FROM dual)a

select to_char(fldcaption) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from(select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:stransid union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid union all select 'Login username-(cusername)' fldcaption,'username' fname,'appvars' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',3 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' )a order by 4,1

formula.a2: Apply this rule only for this criteria

a22.l: select fn_ruledef_formula( :formula,'T','F','','','v1') from dual

select CASE WHEN COALESCE(LENGTH( :formctrltmp ),1) > 2 AND COALESCE(LENGTH( :formcontrl_mask ),1) > 2 THEN :formctrltmp ||','|| :formcontrl_mask WHEN COALESCE(LENGTH( :formctrltmp ),1) < 2 AND COALESCE(LENGTH( :formcontrl_mask ),1) > 2 THEN :formcontrl_mask WHEN COALESCE(LENGTH( :formctrltmp ),1) > 2 AND COALESCE(LENGTH( :formcontrl_mask ),1) < 2 THEN :formctrltmp ELSE NULL end from dual

SELECT LISTAGG(scr,chr(10)) WITHIN group(ORDER BY ord) FROM (SELECT distinct TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR( :formcontrlinp , '[^~!~]+', 1, LEVEL)), '[^`j`]+', 1, 2))scr, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR( :formcontrlinp , '[^~!~]+', 1, LEVEL)), '[^`j`]+', 1, 1)) ord from dual where length( :formcontrlinp ) > 1 CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR ( :formcontrlinp,'[^~!~]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 2)

SELECT CASE WHEN COALESCE(LENGTH( :onchngfldnametmp ),1) > 0 AND COALESCE(LENGTH( :onchngfld_mask),1) > 0 THEN :onchngfldnametmp ||','|| :onchngfld_mask WHEN COALESCE(LENGTH( :onchngfldnametmp ),1) < 1 AND COALESCE(LENGTH( :onchngfld_mask),1) > 0 THEN :onchngfld_mask WHEN COALESCE(LENGTH( :onchngfldnametmp ),1) > 0 AND COALESCE(LENGTH( :onchngfld_mask),1) < 1 THEN :onchngfldnametmp ELSE NULL END FROM dual

onchngfldname.a59: select string_agg(flds,',') from ( select distinct unnest(string_to_array( onchngfldnametmp ,','))flds from (select case when length( coalesce( :onchngfldnametmp ,'')) > 0 and length( coalesce( :onchngfld_mask ,'')) > 0 then concat( :onchngfldnametmp,',', :onchngfld_mask) when length( coalesce( :onchngfldnametmp ,'')) < 1 and length( coalesce( :onchngfld_mask ,'')) > 0 then :onchngfld_mask when length( coalesce( :onchngfldnametmp ,'')) > 0 and length( coalesce( :onchngfld_mask ,'')) < 1 then :onchngfldnametmp else null end onchngfldnametmp)n )a

a22.l: select TO_CHAR(cnd) cnd,cndval,ord,fldlist from (select 'Set value to field' cnd,4 cndval,6 ord,2 fldlist from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Show' cnd,2 cndval,7 ord,0 fldlist FROM dual union all select 'Hide' cnd,2 cndval,8 ord,0 fldlist FROM dual union all select 'Enable' cnd,2 cndval,9 ord,0 fldlist FROM dual union all select 'Disable' cnd,2 cndval,10 ord,0 fldlist FROM dual union all select 'Mandatory' cnd,2 cndval,11 ord,2 fldlist FROM dual union all select 'Non mandatory' cnd,2 cndval,12 ord,2 fldlist FROM dual union all select 'Mask all characters' cnd,31 cndval,13 ord,4 from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Mask few characters' cnd,3 cndval,14 ord,4 from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Confirmation message' cnd,40 cndval,15 ord,3 from dual where 1=2 )a order by ord

select to_char(fldcaption) mslist,cnd groupby,ord grouporder,'false' selected from( select caption||'-('||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'Field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:stransid and :fldcnd in(0,1,2) union all select caption||'-('||dname ||')' fldcaption,dname,'DC' cnd,2 ord from axpdc where tstruct=:stransid and :fldcnd = 0 union all select caption||'-('||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'Field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:stransid and :fldcnd = 4 and modeofentry!='select' union all select title||'-('||KEY||')',key,'Button',3 ord from axtoolbar where name = :stransid and :fldcnd in(0,1,3) )a order by 1

select to_char(fldcaption) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:stransid and :fldcnd in(0,1,2) union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:stransid and :fldcnd = 4 and modeofentry!='select' union all select title||'-('||KEY||')',key,'button',2 ord from axtoolbar where name = :stransid and :fldcnd in(0,1,3) )a order by 1
select fn_ruledef_table_genaxscript( :cmd, :fldcompstmp, cast( :pcnd as numeric)) from dual

onchngfldtmp.a59: select string_agg(substring(split_part(fname, '|', 1), position('-(' in split_part(fname, '|', 1))+ 2, abs((position('-(' in split_part(fname, '|', 1) )+ 2) - length(substring(split_part(fname, '|', 1), 1, length(split_part(fname, '|', 1)))))),',') from(select unnest(string_to_array( :fldcomps, '~')) fname)a where :pcnd = '1'

a22.l: SELECT to_char(caption|| '-('|| fname|| ')') fldcaption, fname , 'field' cnd, 1 ord FROM axpflds WHERE tstruct =:stransid AND modeofentry != 'select' AND customdatatype NOT IN('Large Text', 'Rich Text', 'Check box', 'Image') ORDER BY 1

SELECT to_char(cnd) cnd, cndval, ord, fldlist FROM ( SELECT 'Mask all characters' cnd, 31 cndval, 13 ord, 4 fldlist FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'Mask few characters' cnd, 3 cndval, 14 ord, 4 FROM dual )a ORDER BY ord

select to_char(cnd) from (select '@' cnd FROM dual union all select '.' FROM dual union all select '^' FROM dual union all select 'X' FROM dual union all select '#' FROM dual union all select '$' FROM dual union all select '&' FROM dual union all select '*' FROM dual ) a

firstnchar.a2: No of digits to be displayed in first

lastnchar.a2: No of character to be displayed in last

a22.l: SELECT CASE WHEN :mask_pcnd = '31' THEN :mask_fldcap || '|'|| :maskchar WHEN :mask_pcnd = '3' THEN :mask_fldcap || '|'|| :maskchar || '|'|| regexp_substr( :compval, '[^|]+', 1,2) || '|'|| regexp_substr( :compval, '[^|]+', 3) END FROM dual
select fn_ruledef_table_genaxscript( :maskcmd, :mask_fldcompstmp, cast( :mask_pcnd as numeric)) from dual where length( :maskcmd ) > 0
SELECT to_char(fldcaption) fldcaption, fname, cnd, ord FROM ( SELECT caption|| '-('|| datatype|| fname|| ')' fldcaption, fname , 'field' cnd, 1 ord FROM axpflds WHERE tstruct =:stransid )a ORDER BY 1
SELECT to_char(fldcaption) fldcaption, fname, cnd, ord FROM ( SELECT caption|| '-('|| datatype|| fname|| ')' fldcaption, fname , 'field' cnd, 1 ord FROM axpflds WHERE tstruct =:stransid )a ORDER BY 1
SELECT to_Char(title|| '-('|| KEY|| ')') , KEY FROM axtoolbar a WHERE stype = 'tstruct' AND name = :stransid ORDER BY 1
select fn_ruledef_formula( :btnformula,'T','F','','','v1') from dual
select 'if recordid > 0'||chr(10)||' axreadonly()',chr(10)||'end' from dual where 'T' = :readonly
